snippet: In the third quarter, the Carlyle Group's traditional business of buying and selling companies generated the most growth among the firm's many funds.
abstract: In the third quarter, the Carlyle Group's traditional business of buying and selling companies generated the most growth among the firm's many funds.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Buyout Funds Lift Carlyle in 3rd Quarter
